Definition at line 95 of file IR.c.

void IR_Get_Input_Vector ( void   ) 

Function to read IR message from the detector Stores the 'IR-code' received in the code array (global).

The code received is 'Protocol Independent'. Although the TV remote being used is RC-5 based, it does not assume any specific protocol, as long as the frequency of the remote matches that of the TSOP sensor.
